(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP May) (NNP I))
    (VP (VBD invite)
      (NP (PRP you))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (NN tune)))
      (PP (IN in)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (NNP Makan) (NNPS Places) (NNP Lost) (NNP n) (NNP Found))))
      (NP (DT this) (JJ coming) (NNP Tuesday)))
    (, ,)))


nn(I-2, May-1)
nsubj(invite-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, invite-3)
dobj(invite-3, you-4)
prep(invite-3, to-5)
pobj(to-5, tune-6)
prep(invite-3, in-7)
pcomp(in-7, to-8)
nn(Found-13, Makan-9)
nn(Found-13, Places-10)
nn(Found-13, Lost-11)
nn(Found-13, n-12)
pobj(to-8, Found-13)
det(Tuesday-16, this-14)
amod(Tuesday-16, coming-15)
tmod(invite-3, Tuesday-16)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (CD 15))
    (NP (NNP Jan) (CD 2012))
    (PP (IN at)
      (NP (CD 8.30) (NN pm)))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, 15-1)
dep(15-1, Jan-2)
num(Jan-2, 2012-3)
prep(15-1, at-4)
num(pm-6, 8.30-5)
pobj(at-4, pm-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBG co-hosting)
          (NP (DT the) (NN show))
          (PP
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP (NNP Gurmit) (NNP Singh)))
            (CC and)
            (RB apart)
            (PP (IN from)
              (S
                (VP (VBG introducing)
                  (NP
                    (NP (CD four) (NN hawker) (NNS stalls))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WDT which))
                      (S
                        (VP (VBP have)
                          (VP (VBN relocated)))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(co-hosting-4, I-1)
aux(co-hosting-4, will-2)
aux(co-hosting-4, be-3)
root(ROOT-0, co-hosting-4)
det(show-6, the-5)
dobj(co-hosting-4, show-6)
prep(co-hosting-4, with-7)
nn(Singh-9, Gurmit-8)
pobj(with-7, Singh-9)
cc(with-7, and-10)
conj(with-7, apart-11)
dep(with-7, from-12)
pcomp(from-12, introducing-13)
num(stalls-16, four-14)
nn(stalls-16, hawker-15)
dobj(introducing-13, stalls-16)
nsubj(relocated-19, which-17)
aux(relocated-19, have-18)
rcmod(stalls-16, relocated-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB be)
        (NP (DT a)
          (ADJP (RB very) (JJ interesting))
          (NN skit))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP portray)
              (NP (DT the) (JJ royal) (NN food) (NN taster))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (NNP Emperor) (NNP Gurmit) (NNP Singh))))))))
    (. !)))


expl(skit-7, there-1)
aux(skit-7, will-2)
cop(skit-7, be-3)
det(skit-7, a-4)
advmod(interesting-6, very-5)
amod(skit-7, interesting-6)
root(ROOT-0, skit-7)
advmod(portray-10, where-8)
nsubj(portray-10, I-9)
advcl(skit-7, portray-10)
det(taster-14, the-11)
amod(taster-14, royal-12)
nn(taster-14, food-13)
dobj(portray-10, taster-14)
prep(portray-10, to-15)
nn(Singh-18, Emperor-16)
nn(Singh-18, Gurmit-17)
pobj(to-15, Singh-18)
